title: Commission Directive 92/17/EEC of 17 March 1992 amending Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE 92/17/EEC  of 17 March 1992  amending Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 15 (2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC, '31 March 1991' is replaced by '31 March 1992'.

Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive. They shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof.
When Member States adopt these measures, these shall contain a reference to this Directive or shall be accompanied by such reference on the occasion of their official publication. The procedure for such reference shall be adopted by Member States.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 March 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66. (2) OJ No L 60, 7. 3. 1991, p. 18. (3) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20. (4) OJ No L 316, 16. 11. 1991, p. 43. (5) OJ No L 316, 16. 11. 1991, p. 45.
